this_title: Advaita: Non-Dual Spirituality - from Ancient India to our Global Age
introduction: This documentary traces the evolution of Advaita – from the ancient rishis to teachers like Shankara and Ramana Maharshi – and examines whether or not modern teachings have maintained the power and clarity of the ancient traditions from which they evolved.
